game.name: Storage Hunter Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Storage Hunter Simulator에서 경매의 기술을 마스터하고, 다른 사람보다 먼저 보물을 건져 크게 승리하세요! 높은 리스크만큼, 풍성한 보상을 받을 가능성이 있는 창고 경매의 세계에서 우위를 점하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play as one of the bidders for abandoned warehouses and uncover hidden treasures! Storage Hunter is a garage auction simulation game. Bid, win, and sell for profit! Become the king of storage auction.

reviewHighlights.text: I was excited for the 1.0 release after playing this game for a good few hours throughout early access. Unfortunately though, the game has been releas...
This game in early access was my game of the year, now at 1.0, they literally killed off the game entirely.
